price: 40. Loba: Boyebisa ngai soki etumbu ya Allah eyeli bino to mpe mokolo ya suka ekomeli bino? Bokobelela nzambe mosusu botika Allah soki bozali na bosembo?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ أَتَتۡكُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَدۡعُونَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi aw atatkumu al-sāʿatu aghayra al-lahi tadʿūna in kuntum ṣādiqīna
